"Student A": "Student B"
"Alright- Eh? Eeh? This is strange."
"There seems to be an error with some parts of this video that was recently recorded. It won't allow me to recreate the images."
"Soo disappointed!- That aside, let's listen to the audio recording and see if we can reproduce the images on the screen."
"...Yup, okay. Hitsugi, the coast is clear, come in."
"...Okay let's enter, Aru."
"B-big sis... Take this off. It's scary and I can't see."
"Absolutely not. Take them out and I'll nuke you on the head."
"Don't be mean, I feel sorry for him with the blindfolds."
"Besides, I don't mind Aru seeing me anyways."
"Shut it. Come on, let's wash your body. Alright Aru, come and sit over there."
"Waah! B-big sis, I'm suffering!"
"Bear with it and be patient."
"W-waah!"
"Kyaa."
"Mmn? What's this soft thing..."
"Ah,  wai-Aru!"
"Ah- Hey! Let it go Aru! You show some restraint too, Kohri!"
"This is embarrassing... But... If it's Aru that's touching me, then I can accept it."
"Were you dropped on your head?"
"...Big sis. Are we done yet?"
"...W-wh-whe-Where do you think you're touching! Moron! Aru you idiot! Stop!"
"I can't see anything so I don't know... Where was I touching just now? It's smaller than the first one though..."
"Hmph!"
"Ow!"
"M-me too? Why!"
"...Alright! We're finished! Let's leave after soaking in the bath!"
"Haaa... Nothing like a piping hot soak... This feels heavenly for my stiff shoulders..."
"You deserve every bit of it. Lugging around that heavy pair everywhere. Hmph!"
"It's rough having a big pair, okay? Clothes don't fit, stiff shoulders and unwanted stares..."
"Hmph! You'll never understand the pains of those that are lacking."
"But Hitsugi, your body is nicely average and petite. Isn't that perfect?"
"...If only my height is average too."
"What's big? What's average? What are you talking about?"
"... This has nothing to do with you Aru."
"Eeeh! I wanna join in too! Tell me, tell me!"
"Ah geez, Don't make a fuss! Kyaa! I-I said no touching! Hands off!"
"By the way Hitsugi. What are you going to do with Aru's bath after spring break finishes?"
"The bath won't be empty like this for long, since people will be returning to the dorm."
"...Umm, well..."
"Aah, if Aru was a girl, then there wouldn't be any problems at all."
"...If I became a girl, Big sis wouldn't mind me at all right? I've decided, I'll become a girl!"
"Don't ever think about becoming one!"
"Aru, even if you don't become a girl, you still look like one!"
"Shut up Kohri!"
"Eh, it's rare to see people enter the bath at this time of day."
"Tch, guess being the first one in is just a pipe dream."
"Geh! Club activities are already over?! K-Kohri, quick! Buy us some time!"
"D-distract them, how?!"
"Anything that works is fine! I'll hide Aru somewhere while you're doing that!"
"...Umm, <%me>. Let's keep this data a secret between the two of us."
